abstract: There is little solid research on what makes an effective chief executive, which makes choosing a candidate the product of a board’s vision and personalities rather than one of careful contemplation.
snippet: There is little solid research on what makes an effective chief executive, which makes choosing a candidate the product of a board’s vision and personalities rather than one of careful contemplation.
lead_paragraph: What makes the perfect chief executive? If the way corporate boards at Yahoo and Duke Energy picked chief executives is any indication, it may be up to chance in large part.

headline.main: When Picking a C.E.O. Is More Random Than Wise
